FuncDef: This command configures matching packets that contain the option field or have an option field of zero in the IP header as an IP filter match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies matching on all IP packets that contain the option field in the header. A match will occur for all packets that have the option field present. An option field of zero is considered as no option present.
Specifies matching on IP packets that do not have any option field present in the IP header (an option field of zero). An option field of zero is considered as no option present.
